text: A labourer, M. Ravikumar (55), committed suicide by consuming poison at his residence in Thottavaram village near Pudukkadai in Kanyakumari district on Friday. It was alleged that he committed suicide soon after police visited his residence to inform that he was to appear before a court regarding a case. However, Pudukkadai police said that he killed himself owing to prolonged chest pain. Few cases were pending against the deceased, including theft and damage to public properties.
title: Man commits suicide
